statements: SELECT * FROM player_feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text, timestamp, resolved FROM player_feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, timestamp, resolved, player_id FROM player_feedbacks;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM player_feedbacks WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM player_feedbacks WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_feedbacks WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM player_feedbacks WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedbacks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_feedbacks WHERE player_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000') AND resolved = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resolved_feedbacks FROM player_feedbacks WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT player_id, feedback_date FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, reported_date FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'Open'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_bug_reports FROM bug_reports GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_bug_reports > 1
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 456;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_feedback > 3;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_status = 'Open' ORDER BY reported_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT bug_id, bug_description, player_id FROM bug_reports WHERE player_id IN (789, 456) ORDER BY bug_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players;
SELECT player_id, join_date FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, join_date FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM players INNER JOIN feedback ON players.player_id = feedback.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT players.player_name, feedback.feedback_text FROM players INNER JOIN feedback ON players.player_id = feedback.player_id;
SELECT players.player_name, bug_reports.bug_description, bug_reports.status FROM players INNER JOIN bug_reports ON players.player_id = bug_reports.player_id WHERE bug_reports.status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT bug_description, bug_status FROM bug_reports WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_data WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM player_data ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_data WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT bug_description, bug_status FROM bug_reports ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_name, player_email, registration_date FROM player_data WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_type = 'premium';
SELECT feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bug_description, reporter_id, report_date FROM bug_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating_value, rated_by FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating_value > 3;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bug_description, report_date FROM bug_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_type = 'premium';
SELECT AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM feedback_ratings;
SELECT * FROM bug_reports JOIN bug_resolutions ON bug_reports.report_id = bug_resolutions.bug_id;
